name: Benchcraft_Maier_Microfiber_Sectional_with_Left_Side_Facing_Chaise
reviews: The curbside delivery (more like a drop-off) was not ideal but this sectional is exactly what I was looking for. It's super comfortable, seats at least 5 people at a time and fills up a lot of space if that's what you're looking for.
This is exactly what we have been looking for. Right color and right material. Easy to assemble.
description:
The comfortable contemporary design of the Maier upholstery collection features plush boxed seating and back cushions giving you the comfort you desire while helping enhance your homes decor with exciting jumbo stitch detailing and tufted accents that embrace the modern style.
Material: Foam, Wood, Microfiber, PolyesterStyle: ContemporaryAssembly: AssembledColor: Red, Grey, BrownStyleContemporaryMaterialFoam, Microfiber, Polyester, WoodAssemblyAssembledColorBrown, Grey, Red
